short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save links in one place you need for job applications such as linkedin profile and etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension provides instant access to your frequently used links in job applications, such as your LinkedIn profile, portfolio website, and GitHub link, all in one place. Designed for ease and speed, the extension solves the issue of Google Chrome not always suggesting these links in the address bar. With just one click, you can either navigate directly to the page or copy the link to your clipboard without needing to switch tabs or manually search for the links. Stay efficient while applying for jobs with this simple and time-saving tool!
